title: Executive Order 6637-National Recovery Review Board
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me under the provisions of title 1 of the National Industrial Recovery Act of June 16, 1933 (ch. 90, 48 Stat. 195), and pursuant to Executive order dated March 7, 1934, creating the National Recovery Review Board, the Federal Emergency Administration of Public Works is hereby directed to allot to the said National Recovery Review Board from the moneys heretofore earmarked for the National Recovery Administration, the sum of fifty thousand dollars ($50,000) to carry out its functions.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6637-National Recovery Review Board Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362406
